1538.name: SP 8812-Co
1538.Applications: Ceweld SP 8812-Co is applied with the HVOF and the Plasma spray process whenever wear-resistant coatings are required, e.g. on Valves, Pumps and Turbine parts.
1538.Suitable_For: Ceweld SP 8812-Co powder is usualy applied with the HVOF and the Plasma spray process whenever wear-resistant coatings are required, e.g. on Valves, Pumps and Turbine parts.
